Using Machine Learning to Predict The CPI of the Future


With the power of modern technology, we can use machine learning to try predicting and understanding how the cost of living, minimum wage, and inflation might waver in the future. For each of the data points, we have presented the projected trajectory, as well as an annual and monthly trend for ten years with the last date of actual data being 2014-01-01.
So one thing to remember is the data we used is long before the COVID pandemic.
